name: paladin-log4j-immunizer
description: Paladin protection against log4j websocket attacks.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/tsc && npx tsc && npx browserify build/tsc/background.js -o build/tsc/bundle.js
scripts.package: zip log4jprotector.zip build/tsc/bundle.js manifest.json LICENSE images/*

author: Paladin Cyber
